Title: Relates to expanding the offenses to which a child witness may testify by use of closed-circuit television to include murder
Summary: Relates to expanding the offenses to which a child witness may testify by use of closed-circuit television to include murder.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to expanding the offenses concerning which a child witness may testify by use of closed-circuit television to include murder therein
